title: Bug 117981: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt. The issue is only observed during the initial selection.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, it doesn't get selected.
EB: The item in the library outline view should be selectable on the first attempt.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view for the first time, and observe that it cannot be selected.
